{{also|fuss|Fuss|fúss}} ==Central Franconian== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|gmw-cfr|Foß}} {{i|Ripuarian, northern Moselle Franconian}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|gmw-cfr|goh|fuoz}}, from {{inh|gmw-cfr|gem-pro|*fōts}}, from {{inh|gmw-cfr|ine-pro|*pṓds}}. ===Noun=== {{head|gmw-cfr|noun|g=m}} # {{lb|gmw-cfr|southern|_|Moselle Franconian}} [[foot]] {{gloss|lower part of the leg}} ---- ==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|de|Fuss||Swiss|Liechtenstein}} * {{l|de|Fueß}}; {{l|de|Fuoß}} {{qualifier|obsolete}} * fuͦß/fůß, Fuͦß/Fůß {{qualifier|obsolete}} ===Etymology=== {{PIE root|de|ped}} From {{inh|de|gmh|}}, from {{inh|de|goh|fuoz}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*fōts||foot}} (compare {{cog|fy|foet}}, {{cog|nl|voet}}, {{cog|nds|Foot}}, {{cog|en|foot}}, {{cog|da|fod}}), ultimately from {{inh|de|ine-pro|*pṓds}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/fuːs/}} * {{rhymes|de|uːs}} * {{audio|de|De-Fuß.ogg|audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Fußes|Füße|Füßchen}} #
